author: Hive Bot
subject: feat(events): Implement event system and consolidate error handling
body:
Event System Implementation:
- Created packages/hive-orchestration/src/hive_orchestration/events/
  - events.py: TaskEvent, WorkflowEvent, AgentEvent base classes
  - bus.py: Async event bus with get_async_event_bus()
  - __init__.py: Clean public API with proper exports

author: Hive Bot
subject: chore(lint): Fix unsorted imports (I001) in hive-agent-runtime
body:
Auto-fixed import sorting violations in agent runtime package:
- Alphabetized __all__ exports for consistency
- Moved ExecutionStrategy to correct alphabetical position
- Reordered task-related exports alphabetically
